name: coins_get_fullsize_chart
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool investing_cryptocurrency_markets.
Tool description: These APIs provide data of all cryptocurrencies, markets, ideal for tracking prices and exchange rates.
API description: Fetches the full-size chart data for a specific cryptocurrency pair.

pair_id.description: Value of pair_id field returned in coins/list, coins/search, coins/list-pairs, etc...

pair_interval.description: One of the following is allowed 60 (1min)|300 (5min)|900 (15min)|1800 (30min)|3600 (1h)|18000 (5h)|86400 (1d)|week (1w) |month (1m)

lang_id.description: The value of all_langs/lang_ID returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

time_utc_offset.description: The time offset in UTC seconds. For example, UTC+8 corresponds to 28800 seconds. Default is 28800.
